channel.title: Public Service Announcement: Download links
channel.description:
# Don't Download From Untrusted Links!
_If it's not from the people who wrote it, it's untrusted._
I know this sounds like super basic stuff but we've had to delete/unlist a few posts recently where people (I'm talking about you, @the_heat_man) are posting sketchy links to download tools instead of pointing people to official channels.
Please, please, please do not use these. Do not trust these links. Download only from official sources.
That is all. Carry on.
### Addendum Because *SOMEBODY* thinks I'm implying something that I'm not: we are not telling you to get your warez from official vendors for said product. We are telling you that you shouldn't be downloading warez from this or any infosec forum. Not only is it illegal (I'm required to remind you of that, do with it what you will) but you'll be hard-pressed to find a "clean" keygen or crack that doesn't have something else slipped in with it.
If you wouldn't take drugs from a rando at a party, you shouldn't download warez from forums like this either.

item.title: Public Service Announcement: Download links
item.dc:creator: fraq
item.description:
Don’t Download From Untrusted Links!

If it’s not from the people who wrote it, it’s untrusted.

I know this sounds like super basic stuff but we’ve had to delete/unlist a few posts recently where people (I’m talking about you, @the_heat_man) are posting sketchy links to download tools instead of pointing people to official channels.

Please, please, please do not use these. Do not trust these links. Download only from official sources.

That is all. Carry on.

Addendum

Because SOMEBODY thinks I’m implying something that I’m not: we are not telling you to get your warez from official vendors for said product. We are telling you that you shouldn’t be downloading warez from this or any infosec forum. Not only is it illegal (I’m required to remind you of that, do with it what you will) but you’ll be hard-pressed to find a “clean” keygen or crack that doesn’t have something else slipped in with it.

If you wouldn’t take drugs from a rando at a party, you shouldn’t download warez from forums like this either.
